item.title: Copying a Cell Value to a New Google Sheet With Apps Script
item.description:
I've been messing around with apps script lately and am finding it useful. The below Apps Script was created with a few prompts to Bing Copilot. First, I asked Bing:

Write a Google sheets formula that copies the value in cell B10 to another sheet and also fills another column â€¦
